results.title: Treatment options in insulin resistance obesity-related acanthosis nigricans.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Insulin_Resistant_with_Acanthosis_Nigricans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562710 @@@IRORAN@@@ may benefit from a trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for improvement of lesions and underlying @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Romo A, Benavides S. Treatment options in insulin resistance obesity-related acanthosis nigricans. Ann Pharmacother. 2008 Jul;42(7):1090-4. PMID: 18492785

results.title: Association of metformin and pregnancy in the polycystic ovary syndrome. A report of three cases.
results.text_hl: Association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and pregnancy in the @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@.
